titles.title: TSA Acquisition Reform Act of 2007
To amend title 49, United States Code, by repealing the provision regarding the acquisition management system for the Transportation Security Administration.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1699)
Referred to the Subcommittee on Management, Investigations, and Oversight.
Provisions of Measure Incorporated into H.R. 2764, the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2008.

bill.summary:
8/1/2007--Introduced.
TSA Acquisition Reform Act of 2007 - Repeals provisions exempting the Transportation Security Administration from specified federal procurement requirements.
